Posts.Content: lola11 wrote: Going from silicone implants to flat chested next month and am looking for anyone who might of had tattoo work done over a flat chest. I have seen some really great looks of lace bras down over the area and think this is the road I would like to take. Wondering about the feeling if there is any when tattooed? Also, is there any such thing as fantom feeling from having breast removed and implants out? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Bra tattoo over flat chest anyone? Fantom pain exist? lola11 coraleliz
